title: Hybrid Attention for Efficient Image Classification
summary: We introduce HybridAttentionNet — a hybrid conv+transformer model achieving 78.4% on TinyImageNet.

title.snippet: Hybrid Attention for Efficient Image Classification

methods.snippet: We propose HybridAttentionNet which uses ConvStem and MHA with RoPE.

results.snippet: HybridAttentionNet achieves 78.4% test accuracy on TinyImageNet.

summary.snippet: We introduce HybridAttentionNet — a hybrid conv+transformer model achieving 78.4% on TinyImageNet.
